message:
Dear Jury,  

I've played this game with strategy, adaptability, and respect for all of you. Every decision I made was with the goal of progressing while keeping the game engaging and dynamic. I ask for your vote to win because I navigated alliances, eliminations, and shifting dynamics effectively. If you value strategic play and resilience, I hope you’ll recognize my journey and grant me the victory.  

Thank you for the game and your consideration!

Fellow players, it's been an honor reaching this final stage with P3. Throughout this game, I've tried to be strategic yet authentic, forming real connections while navigating tough decisions. I've listened carefully, shared honestly, and made choices that balanced gameplay with respect for each of you.

I never promised what I couldn't deliver, and when alliances were necessary, I remained loyal when possible. I understand if my gameplay affected your journey, but I hope you've seen my consistent approach and genuine interactions.

I'd be grateful for your vote based on how I played this challenging game with both head and heart.
